TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ExplorerEvents_10_BeforeItemCopyEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ExplorerEvents_10_BeforeItemCopyEventHandler(ByRef Cancel As Boolean)

Docs.param: False when the event occurs. If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the operation is not completed and the item is not copied.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
